summary: Revenue section configuration update: payment methods should only include UPI and CASH, removing all other methods across the app/backend.

existing_features.title: Update the Revenue section UI (RevenueAnalyticsTab payment methods view) to display only UPI and Cash, removing any cards/rows/labels for Bank Transfer, Online, Cheque, and Other.

Update any other frontend payment-method selectors or displays that currently include Bank Transfer, Online, Cheque, or Other (including AMC-related payment method inputs) so the only available options are UPI and Cash, and ensure requests sent to the backend use only the supported variants.
Update frontend React Query hooks and types that depend on the backend PaymentMethodBreakdown shape to match the new backend response (UPI + Cash only).

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove Bank Transfer, Online, Cheque, and Other payment methods from the revenue section/payment methods so only UPI and CASH remain, and remove these methods everywhere (UI and backend/data model).
Update the backend payment method data model so that only UPI and Cash are supported everywhere, removing Bank Transfer, Online, Cheque, and Other variants from all relevant types and APIs.
Update backend revenue/payment breakdown logic to only track and return UPI and Cash totals, removing all Bank Transfer / Online / Cheque / Other fields from the breakdown type and its computation.

Implement a state migration (conditional upgrade) so that any existing stored records using removed payment methods are converted to a supported method (UPI or Cash) during upgrade, preventing runtime traps or decode failures after deploying the new candid interface.
